metadata.title: CVE-2019-6293 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the function mark_beginning_as_normal in nfa.cin flex 2.6.4. There is a stack exhaustion problem caused by themark_beginning_as_normal function making recursive calls to itself incertain scenarios involving lots of '*' characters. Remote attackers couldleverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service.

criterions.comment: flex package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
